The nature of your masters' worship is revealed: Blighted player (1 point). Brethren Member (2 points). Worship at the Obelisk (6 points). Lynch a Blighted player (12 points). $$

When the summoning is triggered by the Obelisk, the essence of the Demon Prince will possess the holder of the Heart of Hades. The essence of the Shadowcaster will possess the holder of the Sceptre of Darkness. $$
Brethren member or Damned villagers must hold the relic for the possession to work. $$

Description: The Obelisk of Blight collects the demonic energies created from your acts of worship. When it has collected enough of these energies the ritual to summon your demon masters to the mortal plane may be completed. You may worship at the Obelisk at night, adding more energies but roleblocking yourself
A Hell Helm allows you to listen to any messages a player sends on the following night

The Heart of Hades looks like a piece of volcanic rock, but it the heart of an ancient Demon Lord, it still beats once a day. The bearer of this relic can use it to kill all players that have been afflicted with blight.

The Demonicron is ancient tome bound, not with leather, but with the skin of an ancient warlock that sought ruinous power. As punishment a Demon trapped the warlock's soul in the book for eternity. Those that study its pages might notice that glyphs slowly twist and writhe into new shapes over time. It is said the Demonicron will lead its reader to powerful relics, wherever they may be.
A small leather bound book containing the notes and musings of a Relic Hunter from the past. It includes scribblings about the last known whereabouts of several legendary relics.
A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
Imbued with Demonic energies, this sceptre allows you to cast a cloud of darkness on one player per night. The darkness will make the player look like a demon to the seer for the rest of the game
Imbued with Demonic energies, this gauntlet allows you to cast blight on one player per night. The bearer of the Heart of Hades can choose to kill all those who have been afflicted with blight.
Imbued with Demonic energies, this gauntlet allows you to cast blight on one player per night. The bearer of the Heart of Hades can choose to kill all those who have been afflicted with blight.

The Demonic Eye is a glowing green jewel. Those that hold it feel an immediate compulsion to drive it into their eye socket, where it takes on the form of a human eye with a deep green iris. The Eye grants them the ability to see those who are blighted, and the power remove blight from one player per night.
The Abyssal Armour is ancient plate armour imbued with Demonic Essence. It will grant you night immunity, but the Seer will think you are a Demon.
A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
